SELECT A.VHC_ID ,A.VHC_NO ,A.AREA ,DL1.DL_CD_NM AS AREA_NM ,A.MAKER ,DL2.DL_CD_NM AS MAKER_NM ,A.REMARK ,B.COMP_NM FROM BMS_VHC_MST A LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST B ON A.COMP_ID = B.COMP_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO DL1 ON A.AREA = DL1.DL_CD AND DL1.CO_CD = 'AREA' LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO DL2 ON A.MAKER = DL2.DL_CD AND DL2.CO_CD = 'MAKER'
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')

SELECT C.VHC_ID ,A.VHC_NO ,A.AREA ,DL1.DL_CD_NM AS AREA_NM ,A.MAKER ,DL2.DL_CD_NM AS MAKER_NM ,A.REMARK ,B.COMP_NM FROM BMS_ALLOC_VHC_CMPSTN C LEFT JOIN BMS_VHC_MST A ON A.VHC_ID = C.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST B ON A.COMP_ID = B.COMP_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO DL1 ON A.AREA = DL1.DL_CD AND DL1.CO_CD = 'AREA' LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO DL2 ON A.MAKER = DL2.DL_CD AND DL2.CO_CD = 'MAKER'
C.ALLOC_ID = #{ALLOC_ID}
AND (C.VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || A.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%'))
AND C.VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND A.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')

SELECT A.OPER_DT , A.ROUT_GRP , A.VHC_ID , A.ROUT_ID , A.ALLOC_NO , A.OPER_SN , A.NODE_ID , A.COR_ID , A.VHC_NO , A.DRV_ID , A.GPS_X , A.GPS_Y , A.TM_X , A.TM_Y , A.OPER_STS , A.BUS_STS , A.OBE_STS , A.SNSTVTY , A.DRV_ANGLE , A.CUR_SPD , A.ACLRTN_YN , A.DCLRTN_YN , A.CUR_STOP_TM , A.OPER_LEN , A.NODE_SN , A.NODE_TYPE , A.ARRV_TM , A.DPRT_TM , A.LINK_ID , A.LINK_SN , A.LINK_SPD , A.PRV_PLCE_NM , A.GET_OFF_CNT , A.PSG_CNT , A.NEXT_NODE_ID , A.NEXT_NODE_ARRV_TM , A.DOOR_CD , A.DOOR_TM , A.UPD_DTM , DL1.DL_CD_NM AS ROUT_GRP_NM , C.ROUT_NM , C.WAY_DIV , D.DRV_NM , E.LINK_NM , F.NODE_NM
FROM BMS_CUR_OPER_INFO A LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO DL1 ON A.ROUT_GRP = DL1.DL_CD AND DL1.CO_CD = 'ROUT_GRP' LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST C ON A.ROUT_ID = C.ROUT_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_DRV_MST D ON A.DRV_ID = D.DRV_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_LINK_MST E ON A.LINK_ID = E.LINK_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST F ON A.NODE_ID = F.NODE_ID
WHERE OPER_DT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y/%m/%d')
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
SELECT MNG_ID FROM BMS_DVC_INFO WHERE VHC_ID = #{VHC_ID} AND DVC_KIND = 'DK001' AND USE_YN = 'Y' LIMIT 1;
